name: red
description: How green this palette color is.

name: green
description: The hue of this palette color.

name: blue
description: The lighting of this palette color, where 0 is black and 255 is white.

name: getHue
description: hue is an int instead of a uint8 because it's a loop instead of a scale. 2, 258, 514, -254, etc., are all equally valid and all mean the same hue.

name: setHSL
full: void setHSL(int hue, uint8 sat, uint8 light)

name: swizzle
full: void swizzle(COLOR::Component red, COLOR::Component green, COLOR::Component blue)
